repair_trucks_trailers_semi_trailers_gra: We repair truck, trailer, semi-trailer, and grain trailer tarps
Таможенный ремонт по ТИР стандартам: Customs repair according to TIR standards
1. Определяем объем и виды работ: 1. Determine the scope and types of work
Повреждения, требующие сервисного ремонт: Damage requiring tent service repairs can be of the following types: cuts, tears, punctures. They are eliminated by gluing or welding with a hot air gun. Sometimes customs repair of the tent is required to meet international transport conditions. But most often, roof tent repair, curtain, or tent repair is required. In the first stage, we choose the best way to restore the tent so that it fully performs the same functions as a new one. We prepare an estimate.
Чтобы тент после ремонта служил долго, п: For the tent to last long after repair, the damaged surface must be thoroughly cleaned of dirt and dust. Also, if necessary, all splicing areas must be degreased. It is essential to ensure the best adhesion with the materials. For this, the surface is wiped with a solvent and then carefully leveled.
Заплатка для спайки должна быть выбрана: The patch for splicing must be chosen so that the tent repair is invisible. Especially if customs repair of the tent is required. Therefore, at the third stage, we select the appropriate material, select the size of the patch, carefully distribute the edges, and do the soldering with a tent heat gun. After the auto tent repair is completed, we make sure that the tent does not leak water. Thus, we ensure a guaranteed quality result.

supportTrainingDesc: We provide complete training and continuous support to our partners. We offer 3-week courses with accommodation and meals, where experienced masters conduct master classes on welding and tent cutting. Training includes:
theoreticalClassesDesc: Basics of welding and tent cutting, safety techniques.
practicalClassesDesc: Working with equipment, performing real orders under the guidance of mentors.
accommodationMealsDesc: Comfortable living conditions and three meals a day are included in the course cost.
